ingredients: 1 Package Tortellini (I used the dried tortellini from Barilla, but you can use fresh or frozen)
1 Onion (I always use sweet yellow onions such as Vidalia Onions)
1 Can White Beans, Drained and Rinsed
1 Can Kidney Beans, Drained and Rinsed
1 Large Box Low Sodium Beef Broth
1/8 Tsp. Crushed Red Pepper Flakes (Adjust to your liking.)
